column4: Ɔwo a igya Josef dɛ nguankuw; Ɔwo a etse Kerubfo ntamu

column3: wɔ Efraim na Benjamin na Manaasɛ enyim
fa hɛn san si yie; Na ma w'enyim nhyerɛn

column4: Onkodu dabɛn na wo bo bofuw etsia wo man hɔn mpaabɔ?"

column2: "Ɔwo edze nyinsu ayɛ edziban ama woedzi
column3: Na ama hɔn nyinsuwa kɔɔpow kɛse ma ma wɔanom."

column2: "Ɔwo edze hɛn yɛ aperdzi ma hɛn asɔnmufo: Na hɛn atamfo sereserew wɔ hɔnara hɔn mu."

column3: fa hɛn san si yie; Na ma w'enyim nhyerɛn

column2: "Ɔwo edze wo nkorɔfo dɛ wenyindua fi Egypt bae; Ɔwo epampaam amanaman na etsɛɛw wo man."

column3: Na n'abaw tse dɛ Nyankopɔn no dum."
Na ne mfefɛwee kodur Esutsen no ho."

column2: "Afei ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ebubu no ho ban
column3: Ma hɔn a wotwa mu wɔ ɔkwan mu nyinara tsetsew no yi?"
Na mbowa abɔyafo fi haban mu we."

column5: san w'ekyir: Kom w'enyi adze fi sor

column3: Na ɔba a afa no ayɛ wodze pintsinn no."
woetwa ato famu: W'enyim nkaenyim ntsi wɔasɛɛ."

column2: "Ma wo nsa nda w'enyimfa nyimpa no do
column3: Ɔnda nyimpa ba a afa no ayɛ wodze pintsinn no do."

column2: "Ɔno na yennkefi wo nkyɛn akɔ ekyir: Ma yennya nkwa

column4: fa hɛn san si yie; Ma w'enyim nhyerɛn
